DICOPPAExtension

@interface DICOPPAExtension : NSObject

This class defines methods that can be used by applications to query COPPA Consent status of logged in user.

@since 1.0.0

  • -getCoppaEmailConsentStatus

    Gets the consent status on Coppa email

    Declaration

    Objective-C

    - (DICOPPASTATUS)getCoppaEmailConsentStatus;

    Swift

    func getCoppaEmailConsentStatus() -> DICOPPASTATUS

    Return Value

    coppastatus DICOPPASTATUS @since 1.0.0

  • -fetchCoppaEmailConsentStatusWithCompletion:

    Fetches the latest COPPA consent status from server by fetching user profile.

    @since 1.0.0

    Declaration

    Objective-C

    - (void)fetchCoppaEmailConsentStatusWithCompletion:
    (void (^)(DICOPPASTATUS, NSError *))completion;

    Swift

    func fetchCoppaEmailConsentStatus(completion: ((DICOPPASTATUS, Error?) -> Void)!)

    Parameters

    completion

    Block will be called when consent status has been received successfully or has failed with error.
  • -getCoppaConsentLocale

    Returns locale used in consent displayed for your app.

    Declaration

    Objective-C

    - (NSString *)getCoppaConsentLocale;

    Swift

    func getCoppaConsentLocale() -> String!

    Return Value

    locale used in consent displayed for your app @since 1.0.0
